Help: Materials bulk upload with GRN validation for inbound indent
Suites: indent3
Test
---
!** Configuration
1.Enable the following in mongoDB:
inbound_grn_bulk_upload,
inbound_indent_add_materials,
import_material_invoice_grn,
inbound_import_material_invoice_grn,
indent_upload_material

2.Upload Materials+GRN header config

3."reject_complete_material_invoice" : true

!***> Unique values assignment
!| Script  |Common                                       |
|$unique=  |getCurrentDateTimeStamp;|yMMddHHmmss         |
|$cGroup=  |getRandomString;        |5        |ALPHAUPPER|
|$vno_1=   |getRandomNumber;        |20       |76        |
|$vno_2=   |getRandomString;        |2        |ALPHAUPPER|
|$vno_3=   |getRandomNumber;        |1000     |9999      |
|$currDate=|getCurrentDateTimeStamp |iso                 |
|$year=    |getSubString;           |$unique  |0   |4    |
|$today=   |getSubString;           |$currDate|0   |10   |
|$num=     |getRandomNumber;        |100000   |999999    |
|$indate=  |getCurrentDateTimeStamp;|yyyy/MM/dd          |

!| Script           |DateUtil                              |
|$contractDate=     |dateCalculation;|dd-MMM-yyyy|2        |
|$loadingDate=      |dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd |0        |
|$truckindate=      |dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd |-5       |
|$vechicle_req_date=|dateCalculation;|yyyy/MM/dd |0        |
|$truckinuitime=    |dateCalculation;|hour       |hh:mma|-3|
|$truckinuidate=    |dateCalculation;|dd-MM-yyyy |-3       |

!| Script           |Common                                                |
|$truckindate=      |stringConcatenation;|$truckindate      |!- 10:00:00 -!|
|$vechicle_req_date=|stringConcatenation;|$vechicle_req_date|!- 10:00:00 -!|

!| Script               |DateUtil                           |
|$loadingDate=          |utcConversion;  |$loadingDate      |
|$truckindate=          |utcConversion;  |$truckindate      |
|$invoice_filter_date=  |dateCalculation;|yyyy-MM-dd   |0   |
|$voucher_filter_todate=|dateCalculation;|yyyy-MM-dd   |1   |
|$vechicle_req_date=    |utcConversion;  |$vechicle_req_date|
